content:
--
本件保存七年
G2-62- 2447
1
MEMORANDUM
August 9, 2
To : Mr. R. L. Hirshberg, Program Officer, US AJD/c From : C. C. Chang, Chief, Second DivisionOriginal signed by C. C. Chang Subject : Excess Equipment
Reference is made to the attached copy of SDC letter SPC-5514 dated August 3, 1962 and Reports of Excess Equipment.
In the above letter, SDC requested acquisition of spare parts for 6 x 6 GMC truck now available at Tainan Air Base. If you concur and they are available, please initiate necessary action for acquisition.
Encl. Reports Copy of SDC letter cc: (with copy of SDC letter) SDC 2D, 3D, 40 CS/poh
E-16.13. 2
51. 3. 100×200
(2) 212 D
Academia Historica
45

paragraphs.content: To : Mr. R. L. Hirshberg, Program Officer, US AJD/c From : C. C. Chang, Chief, Second DivisionOriginal signed by C. C. Chang Subject : Excess Equipment
Reference is made to the attached copy of SDC letter SPC-5514 dated August 3, 1962 and Reports of Excess Equipment.

In the above letter, SDC requested acquisition of spare parts for 6 x 6 GMC truck now available at Tainan Air Base. If you concur and they are available, please initiate necessary action for acquisition.
Encl. Reports Copy of SDC letter cc: (with copy of SDC letter) SDC 2D, 3D, 40 CS/poh
